events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this product is not what I purchased.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product sent to the customer.
Assigning this refund case to agent Laura for further handling and follow-up.
Hello! I’m Laura, and I’ll be assisting you today with your refund request. Let’s get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and I have attached the photo showing the wrong item clearly as you requested.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this so quickly. I really appreciate your help.
The refund process has been completed on our end, and you should see the amount reflected in your account soon.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since the refund was received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
